summary: In the spring of 1983, a new generation of superstars was poised to enter the NFL. Six quarterbacks were selected in the first round of that draft - still the most ever. Elway to Marino explores this landmark draft.
cast: Tom Selleck|Ernie Accorsi|Bruce Allen|Howard Balzer|Chris Berman|Todd Blackledge|Terry Bradshaw|Gil Brandt|Joe Browne|Chuck Connor|Jimbo Covert|Al Davis|Len Dawson|Marvin Demoff|Tony Eason|Jack Elway|John Elway|Dan Fouts|Fred Gaudelli|Jack Ham|John Hannah|Jim Heffernan|Bill Hillgrove|Chris Hinton|Gary Hughes|Robert Irsay|Jim Kelly|Bill Kenney|Gene Klein|Frank Kush|Jack Lambert|Tom Landry|Howie Long|John Mackovic|Sal Marchiano|Dan Marino|Ron Meyer|Don Mosebar|Chuck Noll|Ken O'Brien|Norm Pollom|Dan Reeves|Gabe Rivera|Art Rooney Jr.|Pete Rozelle|Don Shula|Rick Smith|Roger Staubach|Leigh Steinberg|Patrick Sullivan|Don Weiss|Ron Wolf|Paul Zimmerman
title: Elway to Marino
